string-array.name: rotate_d
string-array.item: Is it allowed to rotate edges when the screen rotates

string-array.name: xposition_d
string-array.item: The secondary position of this edge

string-array.name: seek_task_d
string-array.item: The task should be executed when the edge get touched

string-array.name: vibration_d
string-array.item: The vibration duration when the edge get touched

string-array.name: maximum_d
string-array.item: Maximum value allowed to be set

string-array.name: minimum_d
string-array.item: Minimum value allowed to be set

string-array.name: stream_d
string-array.item: For audio task. To define what stream to be targeted

string-array.name: double_click_task_d
string-array.item: The task should be executed when the edge get double touched
